Name: Interstate Drifter 2000
About the game: The Interstate Drifters race each other and fight the system in this pixelated arcade style 2d driving game. Use different types of cars and powerups, rack up your score, and don't get busted. Features: -Open game world -Simple & unique gameplay -isometric pixel art style -Retro color palettes -CRT-filter and other screen effects -Xbox controller support -Local highscores/medals -Steam highscores Designed and developed by ULTIMO.
